name: Iron Frontier
description:
In Iron Frontier, defend your position from waves of enemies using the help of your mech. Collect material by building an Ore Collector (the location of which is different for each game) which can be spent to buy turrets. Your mech can act as a mobile artillery platform, and can receive orders remotely; in addition, you can ride on top of it for added firepower in tough situations. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A NOTE ABOUT THE DIFFERENT VERSIONS: I didn't have time to add a mouse slider, so the low sensitivity version is basically just an identical upload with lower mouse sensitivity. 

Controls are accessible by pressing escape

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
